org.apache.taverna.reference.impl

Class SimpleCacheProviderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.SimpleCacheProviderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReferenceServiceCacheProvider

    public class SimpleCacheProviderImpl
extends Object
implements ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
    Completely naive cache provider that just stores everything in a map. This will run out of memory as it makes no attempt to evict old items, it's really just here as a test!

      • get

        public Identified get(T2Reference id)
        Description copied from interface: ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
        Called before an attempt is made to retrieve an item from the backing store
        Specified by:
        get in interface ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
        Parameters:
        id - the T2Reference of the item to retrieve
        Returns:
        a cached item with matching T2Reference, or null if the cache does not contain that item

      • put

        public void put(Identified i)
        Description copied from interface: ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
        Called after an Identified has been written to the backing store, either for the first time or after modification. In our model ReferenceSet is the only Identified that is modifiable, specifically only by the addition of ExternalReferenceSPI instances to its reference set.
        Specified by:
        put in interface ReferenceServiceCacheProvider
        Parameters:
        i - the Identified written to the backing store
